title: Perfect pumpkin pie
ingredients: ['1 egg, lightly beaten', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '150g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '375g pumpkin puree', '350ml evaporated milk', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '2 tablespoons golden syrup', '1 sheet shortcrust pastry']
